page.title: 16Daily Lives (continued)
page.content: Mum now leaves the rather quiet house to my Nan.She departs for work at about 9.30,and cycles.Her works are less than a mile away,in Byfleet village,so it doesn't take long. My dad drives for about 20 minutes to his work,before reaching Guilford,and arriving at 8.30a.m he remains there till 5.00p.m.,when he drives home. My school day finshes at 3.15,and I either catch the bus home at 4.00 or I walk.This gets me home at the same time. Mum only works part-time.She finishes at 1.00,and shops on her way home,so normally,comes home to see Nan about 1.30 p.m. When I come in from school,first,I do my homework,then go out and play with my friends. Dad normally comes in about 5.30
